excerpt: In Birmingham, rich kid Jeff Bridges falls for gym receptionist Sally Field and befriends bodybuilder Arnold Schwarzenegger, much to the dismay of his country-club family and friends.
title: Stay Hungry

excerpt: Haunted by nightmares after losing her unborn child in a car crash, a woman turns to a Satanic cult for relief, only to find she cannot escape their influence.
title: They're Coming to Get You!

excerpt: Three years into his crime-fighting career, a young Superman battles a series of schemes orchestrated by billionaire Lex Luthor.
title: Superman

excerpt: New York City vice cop Gene Hackman relentlessly pursues a case involving a local hood and a visiting drug dealer from France.
title: The French Connection

excerpt: Disgraced Union officer James Coburn assembles a suicide squad of condemned men to retake the fort he surrendered.
title: A Reason to Live, a Reason to Die
